Title: Cached Data Is Deleted after Use
DirectLink: Cached Data Is Deleted after Use

Data:
==What to Check For==

Verify that cached data is deleted after use.

==Why==

If the device is lost or compromised, cached data may be recovered by attackers.

==How to Check==

To verify that cached data is deleted after use:

# **Identify cached data.** Make a list of all data cached by the application. Find code that is responsible for each peace of data that is cached.
# **Verify that sensitive data is not cached.** Examine code that caches data to verify that sensitive data is not cached.

==How to Fix==

To delete cached data after use:

# **Identify cached data.** Make a list of all data cached by the application. Find code that is responsible for each peace of data that is cached.
# **Do not cache sensitive data.** Examine code that caches data to verify that sensitive data is not cached.
# **Add code that removes cached data.** For all code that caches data, make sure that there is code that removes the data that has been cached.

==Privacy Guidelines==

* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000561ff3|Do Not Cache Sensitive Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000007e1362|Do Not Log Location Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000001dcb79|Do Not Log Sensitive Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000629cc3|Delete Cached Data after Use]]

==Privacy Checklists==

* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000003b2aca|Sensitive Data Is Not Cached]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000006c27b2|Location Data Is Not Logged]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000005a7753|Sensitive Data Is Not Logged]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000007c99a7|Cached Data Is Deleted after Use]]
